metadata.title: CVE-2018-12536 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Eclipse Jetty Server, all 9.x versions, on webapps deployed usingdefault Error Handling, when an intentionally bad query arrives thatdoesn't match a dynamic url-pattern, and is eventually handled by theDefaultServlet's static file serving, the bad characters can trigger ajava.nio.file.InvalidPathException which includes the full path to the baseresource directory that the DefaultServlet and/or webapp is using. If thisInvalidPathException is then handled by the default Error Handler, theInvalidPathException message is included in the error response, revealingthe full server path to the requesting system.

criterions.comment: jetty9 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
